text:
Andrzej Kopiczyński (15 April 1934 – 13 October 2016) was a Polish actor. He appeared in more than 50 movies and television between 1958 and 2016. He was known for his starring role as Stefan Karwowski in the comedy series "Czterdziestolatek" (1974-1977). Kopiczyński was born in Międzyrzec Podlaski, Poland.
Kopiczyński died in Warsaw on 13 October 2016 of Alzheimer's disease at the age of 82.
